column5: Hi, I am new to this forum. Seems like a great place. Just wondering if anyone knows if 1. Fishing is allowed on humber river right by 427 and finch. I am interested in Catch and release 2. If it is allowed, what kind of fishes are there in the river?  Thank you in advance for your advise, Amol
I'd be interested to know - I live near the area too...
sucker carp catfish chub  i've fished it 20 times or so as it runs through my backyard right behind humber college. let's just say i've given up.  about 1 chub every 5 attempts. i gave up.
That areas pretty dead.  You either have to go to the lower area or the headwaters
Stonefly, I laugh out loud as well and second that motion.  The Humber does suck. Well...most of it anyways.
Thank you for the reply. So whats around that neighbourhood thats good for catch and release. Any lakes or ponds around?
